        <description/>
        <name>AppointmentCalendarImpl</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AppointmentCalendarImpl = Class.create();
var CONFIG_NOT_FOUND = gs.getMessage("Configuration not found");
AppointmentCalendarImpl.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.appointmentBookingDao = new sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBooking_Factory().getWrapperType(AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_DAO);

;
		this.appointmentBookingUtil = new AppointmentBookingUtil();
    },
	
	getCalendarData : function(catalogId, location, openedFor){
		var serviceConfigGR = this.appointmentBookingDao.getServiceConfig(catalogId);
		var calendarObject = {};
		while(serviceConfigGR.next()){
			
			var appointment_booking_config = serviceConfigGR.getValue(AppointmentBookingConstants.APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_CONFIG);
			var future_bookable_max_days = serviceConfigGR.getValue(AppointmentBookingConstants.FUTURE_BOOKABLE_MAX_DAYS);		
			var lead_time = serviceConfigGR.getValue(AppointmentBookingConstants.LEAD_TIME);
			var defaultTzSetting = serviceConfigGR.getValue(AppointmentBookingConstants.DEFAULT_TIMEZONE);
			
			
			//Calculate range start and range end. Range start = today + leadTime. Range end = today + future bookable max days
			var timeZone = this.appointmentBookingUtil.getTimeZone(location, openedFor, defaultTzSetting);
			
			var now = new GlideDateTime();
			var start = new GlideDateTime(now);
			var secondsToAdd = new GlideDateTime(lead_time).getNumericValue()/1000;
			start.addSeconds(secondsToAdd);
			
			var end = new GlideDateTime(now);
			end.addDaysLocalTime(future_bookable_max_days);
			
			var startRangeUTC = new GlideScheduleDateTime(start.toString());
			var startRangeConverted = startRangeUTC.convertTimeZone("UTC", timeZone);
			calendarObject.range_start = startRangeConverted.toString();
			
			var endRangeUTC = new GlideScheduleDateTime(end.toString());
			var endRangeConverted = endRangeUTC.convertTimeZone("UTC", timeZone);
			calendarObject.range_end = endRangeConverted.toString();			
		}
		if(Object.keys(calendarObject).length == 0){
			return this.appointmentBookingUtil.generateErrorResponse(CONFIG_NOT_FOUND,"CONFIG_NOT_FOUND");
		}
		return this.appointmentBookingUtil.generateSuccessResponse(calendarObject);
	},

    type: 'AppointmentCalendarImpl'
};]]></script>
